title: 15e14 - Inspectors.
text:
Employees who make
inspections at a covered construction site to see that the work meets the
specifications and requirements of the contract or established standards and
codes are not usually considered to be “laborers” or “mechanics” for purposes
of DBRA. However, if such workers perform other duties as laborers or
mechanics, they must be paid the WD rate for the particular classification
involved for the time so spent.
